name: Acolyte
description: Served in a temple; performed sacred rites and ceremonies.

name: Artisan
description: Trained craftsman with knowledge of tools and trade.

name: Charlatan
description: Deceptive trickster with a talent for manipulation.

name: Entertainer
description: Performer skilled in music, dance, or storytelling.

name: Farmer
description: Raised in a rural environment, hardy and self-sufficient.

name: Guard
description: Trained in protecting others and enforcing the law.

name: Guide
description: Experienced in navigating wilderness and helping others travel.

name: Hermit
description: Lived in isolation, with deep introspective knowledge.

name: Noble
description: Born into a family of privilege with social influence.

name: Sage
description: Studied history, magic, or the cosmos in detail.

name: Sailor
description: Spent life aboard ships, familiar with sea travel and weather.

name: Scribe
description: Worked with books, documents, and the written word.

name: Soldier
description: Trained in war and survival in hostile environments.

name: Wayfarer
description: Traveled extensively, collecting stories and cultural knowledge.
